Product Executive-HKG

Hong Kong |
Hong Kong,
Hong Kong
Job ID: 21584
Job Description
Position at Ingram Micro

Responsibilities:
  • Assist in managing profitability of assigned products including sales, marketing and stock planning
  • Liaise and negotiate with designated vendors on all product-related issues
  • Develop and maintain good collaboration with designated vendors
  • Assist in marketing strategy deployment and vendor-funded project/programs
  • Assist Product Manager to plan and execute B2B marketing strategies and programs for lead generation and customer retention
  • Analyze and forecast the market and product trend
  • Prepare reports, claims, PO, and price book updating
Requirements:
  • Degree holder in Marketing, Computer Science or equivalent
  • 1-2 years of experience in product marketing of IT solution
  • Vendor and Partners management experience is preferred
  • Mature, customer oriented with good negotiation and interpersonal skills
  • Proficient in English & Chinese
  • Positive, self-motivated and passion in new business development
